detailedDescription: Take advantage of our competitive personal loan with rates as low as 5.99% APR. Whether you're consolidating debt, financing a home improvement project, or covering unexpected expenses, our personal loan offers flexible terms from 2 to 7 years with loan amounts up to $50,000. No collateral required and funds can be available as soon as the next business day after approval.

Enjoy a 0% intro APR for the first 15 months on purchases and balance transfers, plus no annual fee ever. You'll also receive a $200 welcome bonus after spending $1,000 in the first 3 months. Additional benefits include travel insurance, purchase protection, and 24/7 fraud monitoring.

detailedDescription: Make your homeownership dreams a reality with our competitive mortgage rates starting at 6.25% APR for qualified buyers. We offer conventional, FHA, VA, and jumbo loans with down payments as low as 3%. Our experienced loan officers will guide you through every step of the process, and we can often close in as little as 21 days. First-time homebuyer programs available.

name: MBA Student Loan
description: A tailored loan product for Executive MBA students at Simon Fraser University, offering 0% interest with no annual fees.
detailedDescription: The Executive MBA Student Loan is designed to support ambitious students pursuing their Executive MBA at Simon Fraser University. This loan offers a budget range of $30,000 to $70,000, providing financial access without the burden of interest or annual fees. Our product aims to empower students to focus on their studies and career advancement.
features: 0% interest rate for the entire loan term
No annual fees or hidden charges
benefits: Financial support tailored specifically for Executive MBA students
Peace of mind with no interest accumulation

terms.fees: No annual fees; no origination fees
terms.eligibilityRequirements: Enrolled in the Executive MBA program at Simon Fraser University; proof of enrollment and satisfactory academic progress required

Flexible repayment terms ranging from 3 to 7 years
benefits: Affordable monthly payments for budget-conscious families
